utils.connect Module

class utils.connect.SUMOConnection(sumocfg: str)

Bases: object

SUMOConnection class for managing connections to the SUMO simulation.

label

Unique label for the connection.

Type:

str

sumocfg

Path to the SUMO configuration file.

Type:

str

sumo_

The SUMO simulation object.

Type:

object

sumo_cmd

Command list to start SUMO.

Type:

list

Todo

Add more detailed explanation about how the SUMOConnection class works.

CONNECTION_LABEL = 0
__init__(sumocfg: str) → None

Initializes the SUMOConnection object with a specific SUMO configuration file.

Parameters:

sumocfg (str) – Path to the SUMO configuration file.

close()

Closes the connection to the SUMO simulation.

connect_gui()

Connects to the SUMO simulation with a Graphical User Interface.

Returns:

The traci SUMO object after connection.

Return type:

traci.Connection

connect_libsumo_no_gui()

Connects to the SUMO simulation without a GUI using libsumo.

Returns:

The libsumo SUMO object after connection.

Return type:

libsumo.Connection

connect_no_gui()

Connects to the SUMO simulation without a Graphical User Interface.

Returns:

The traci SUMO object after connection.

Return type:

traci.Connection
